short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add ephemral sticky notes to your tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CommenTab allows you to add ephemeral sticky notes to any website in order to remember what you were last doing in a certain website. Once a website is closed or navigated away from, the sticky note is removed and deleted forever.
